title: Romantic Eco-Luxe Italian Castle Stay
description: In the stunning Italian hills of Piedmont sits Vistaterra, an incredible hotel where sustainable practices and a 17th century castle meet to create a truly unforgettable destination. Surrounded by beautiful greenery, located on the grounds of Parella castle, this is where the past and future combine to create a holiday experience that is all about respecting the earth and respecting its people. Includes a three-course dinner of delicious local produce, a tasting of local wines, a guided tour of the gorgeous Parella Castle, daily buffet breakfast and more.
offer_address: Via Francesco Carandini, 40, 10010 Parella TO, Italy

title: Five-Star Northern Italy Boutique City Escape in Former Royal Residence
description:
Live like royalty in the heart of Turin with a stay at the five-star Principi di Piemonte, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. A former residence of the Italian royal family, the restored hotel remains one of the city’s architectural gems, combining contemporary comforts within a 1930s rationalist-style building.

Just steps from the iconic boutiques of Via Roma and a five-minute walk from Porta Nuova train station, it couldn’t be better placed for exploring Turin on foot. Although, there’s plenty to delight before hitting the city’s cobblestone laneways - start in the basement of the hotel where you'll find one of the city’s finest wellness centres, with a spacious steam room, sauna, and whirlpool tub. Dine on fine Italian cuisine in the intimate onsite Casa Savoia restaurant, or sip on a fine wine on the panoramic terrace, complete with views over the city centre.
offer_address: Via Piero Gobetti, 15, 10123 Torino TO, Italy

title: Italy Turin Modern Hideaway Just 15 Minutes from the City Centre
description: Be enchanted by the magic of northern Italy when you stay at Holiday Inn Turin - Corso Francia, an IHG Hotel. This is the ideal base for exploring the tree-lined streets of Turin; a place to return to after afternoons trawling the countless museums, medieval churches and restaurants. Kickstart your day with a fresh coffee in the hotel's lobby, and enjoy traditional Italian fare with a modern twist at the onsite restaurant Fermata Venchi.
location_description: Holiday Inn Turin - Corso Francia, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Corso Francia Piazza Massaua 21, Turin 10142, Italy
